Rumble was also the biggest wimp of the cassetticons. ;)

Yeah BW/BM kept a size consistency relatively easy (Unlike hand cartoons,
computer animated models can be saved at a standard scaling ;) ). Though I
wouldn't say it was "perfect", there has been a few times when the scale has
been thrown off a bit (usually when cheetor or rat trap was caught in one of
the spiders energy webs).

In any case using BW scaling standards they basically did shrink the
generation into pint sized versions of their ancestors. (good comparison in
sizes is when megs hovers before prime to blow his head off).
